00012 int ClientProcessor::InitDb(std::string h, std::string u, std::string p,
00013                 std::string db) {
00014 
00015         mysql = new MysqlConnector(h, u, p, db);
00016 
00017         if (mysql->init() < 0) {
00018                 m_logger->error("can't init database");
00019                 return -1;
00020         }
00021 
00022         return 0;
00023 }

00025 int ClientProcessor::GetDeliverMessage(Data* data) {
00026         Smpp::DeliverSm* pdu = (Smpp::DeliverSm*) data->hdr;
00027 
00028         Message* msg = new Message();
00029 
00030         msg->type = DELIVERY_REPORT;
00031         msg->from = pdu->source_addr().address();
00032         msg->to = pdu->destination_addr().address();
00033         msg->registeredDelivery = pdu->registered_delivery();
00034         msg->codingScheme = smppHelper->getCodingScheme(pdu);
00035         smppHelper->getMessage(pdu, msg->body);
00036 
00037         data->msg = msg;
00038         data->esm_class(pdu->esm_class());
00039 
00040         return 0;
00041 }
00042 
00043 void ClientProcessor::runLoop() {
00044         try {
00045                 std::string dstAddr, srcAddr;
00046                 Smpp::SubmitSm *sm;
00047                 Smpp::DeliverSm *deliverSm;
00048                 Request *req;
00049                 unsigned long sn;
00050 
00051                 MT_LOGTRACE("try get from queue address: " << inQ <<", size: "<< inQ->size())
00052                 Data* data = inQ->pop();
00053                 MT_LOGTRACE("get from queue address: " << inQ <<", size: "<< inQ->size())
00054 
00055                 if (data == NULL) {
00056                         usleep(1);
00057                         return;
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 switch (data->hdr->command_id()) {
00061                 case Smpp::CommandId::DeliverSm:
00062                         deliverSm = (Smpp::DeliverSm*) data->hdr;
00063 
00064                         srcAddr = deliverSm->source_addr().address();
00065                         dstAddr = deliverSm->destination_addr().address();
00066                         MT_LOGTRACE("recv DeliverSm pdu src(" << srcAddr << ") dst(" << dstAddr << ")")
00067                         if (!GetDeliverMessage(data)) {
00068                                 if (data->isNormalMessage()) {
00069 
00070                                         MT_LOGTRACE("Processor send normal message sm msg to user");
00071                                         userQ->push(data);
00072 
00073                                 } else {
00074                                         if (!ProcessDeliverSm(data)) {
00075                                                 MT_LOGDEBUG("Processor send Delivery report to user.");
00076                                                 userQ->push(data);
00077                                         } else {
00078                                                 MT_LOGTRACE("not all delivery report recieved");
00079                                         }
00080                                 }
00081                         } else {
00082                                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't process pdu");
00083                                 delete data;
00084                         }
00085                         break;
00086                 case Smpp::CommandId::SubmitSm:
00087                         sm = (Smpp::SubmitSm*) data->hdr;
00088                         srcAddr = sm->source_addr().address();
00089                         dstAddr = sm->destination_addr().address();
00090                         MT_LOGTRACE("recv Submit sm pdu src(" << srcAddr <<") dst("<< dstAddr<<")")
00091 
00092                         sn = GetSeqNum();
00093                         data->hdr->sequence_number(sn);
00094                         setRequestBySN(sn, data->req);
00095                         data->req = NULL;
00096                         outQ->push(data);
00097                         MT_LOGTRACE("put SubmitSm in out queue. size is: "<<outQ->size()<<" address: "<<outQ)
00098                         break;
00099 
00100                 case Smpp::CommandId::SubmitSmResp:
00101                         sn = data->hdr->sequence_number();
00102                         req = GetRequestBySN(sn);
00103                         if (req != NULL) {
00104                                 if (req->needDeliverResp())
00105                                         insertMsgId(req->id, data->hdr);
00106 
00107                                 if (!req->HasResp(data->hdr->command_status())) {
00108 
00109                                         data->status = req->GetStatus();
00110                                         data->id = req->id;
00111 
00112                                         MT_LOGTRACE("send submit sm resp to user");
00113                                         userQ->push(data);
00114                                         delete req;
00115                                         req = NULL;
00116                                 }
00117                         } else {
00118                                 MT_LOGWARNING("can't find request for syq_no "<<sn)
00119                         }
00120 
00121                         break;
00122                 default:
00123                         break;
00124                 }
00125 
00126         } catch (...) {
00127                 MT_LOGERROR("catch unknown exception in main cycle")
00128         }
00129         return;
00130 }

00132 void ClientProcessor::insertMsgId(unsigned int reqId, Smpp::Header* hdr) {
00133 
00134         char sql_buf[1024];
00135         std::string msgId;
00136 
00137         if (!hdr->command_status()) {
00138 
00139                 Smpp::SubmitSmResp *sm = (Smpp::SubmitSmResp*) hdr;
00140 
00141                 msgId = sm->message_id();
00142                 snprintf(sql_buf, 1024, "insert into tMsgIds values('%s', '%u')",
00143                                 msgId.c_str(), reqId);
00144                 std::string sqlQuery = sql_buf;
00145 
00146                 try {
00147                         mysql->execCmd(sqlQuery);
00148                 } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00149                         MT_LOGERROR("Database exception: "<<e.what())
00150                 }
00151 
00152         } else {
00153                 MT_LOGERROR("SubmitSmStatus not ok. no processing.")
00154         }
00155 
00156 }

00158 unsigned int ClientProcessor::ProcessDeliverSm(Data* data) {
00159 
00160         unsigned int msgPartRecieved = 0, ret = 0;
00161         char sql_query[2048], c_msgId[256];
00162         std::string sqlQuery;
00163         try {
00164                 if (data->msg->body.find("id:") != std::string::npos)
00165                         sscanf(data->msg->body.c_str(), "id:%s", c_msgId);
00166                 else
00167                         sscanf(data->msg->body.c_str(), "%s", c_msgId);
00168 
00169                 snprintf(
00170                                 sql_query,
00171                                 2048,
00172                                 "SELECT tDeliverSmCache.context, tDeliverSmCache.part_num, tDeliverSmCache.req_id FROM tMsgIds, tDeliverSmCache where "
00173                                         "tMsgIds.msg_id = '%s' and tDeliverSmCache.req_id = tMsgIds.req_id",
00174                                 c_msgId);
00175 
00176                 DbDataPtr dbData = mysql->exec(std::string(sql_query));
00177                 if (!dbData) {
00178                         MT_LOGWARNING("can't get message id from db. db is empty. "<<std::string(sql_query))
00179                         ret = 1;
00180                 } else {
00181                         if (!dbData->isEmpty()) {
00182                                 data->msg->context = dbData->getColumn(0).getString(0);
00183                                 msgPartRecieved = dbData->getColumn(1).getUnsignedInt(0);
00184                                 data->id = dbData->getColumn(2).getUnsignedInt(0);
00185 
00186                                 msgPartRecieved--;
00187                                 snprintf(
00188                                                 sql_query,
00189                                                 2048,
00190                                                 "UPDATE tDeliverSmCache SET part_num=%u where req_id = %u",
00191                                                 msgPartRecieved, data->id);
00192                                 mysql->execCmd(std::string(sql_query));
00193 
00194                                 MT_LOGDEBUG("req id = " << data->id<<" sent parts was "<<msgPartRecieved)
00195 
00196                                 if (!msgPartRecieved) {
00197 
00198                                         snprintf(sql_query, 2048,
00199                                                         "DELETE from tDeliverSmCache where req_id = %u",
00200                                                         data->id);
00201                                         mysql->execCmd(std::string(sql_query));
00202 
00203                                         snprintf(sql_query, 2048,
00204                                                         "DELETE from tMsgIds where req_id = %u", data->id);
00205                                         mysql->execCmd(std::string(sql_query));
00206 
00207                                 } else {
00208                                         ret = 1;
00209                                 }
00210 
00211                         } else {
00212                                 MT_LOGWARNING("row is emty. " << std::string(sql_query))
00213                                 ret = 1;
00214                         }
00215 
00216                 }
00217 
00218         } catch (const std::exception &e) {
00219                 MT_LOGERROR("Database exception: "<<e.what())
00220         }
00221 
00222         return ret;
00223 }
